channel.title: Storing a players name?
channel.description: yes i was wondering how i can store the other players name in a variable for later use? kinda like when u right click trade some one how does it get there name, ive been at this for hours and cant figure it out, i need the varable for use so that i can use it to display there name on my screen and as well as be able to us it along side commands.
